rules.natural: If the material is processed with the standard method, then it is suitable for production.
Provided that the technology requires certification from the safety board, either the material is processed with the advanced method or it is processed with the standard method.
Whenever the technology requires certification from the quality board, the material is processed with the advanced method or it is processed with the standard method.
If the facility is under investigation by the authorities, then the facility has suspended operations.
The facility avoids a fine from the regulatory agency only if it does not receive a fine from the regulatory agency.
In the event that the technology is approved for use in manufacturing, if the purification system improves the purity of the material, then the material meets the quality specifications standards.
Either the facility passes inspection by the regulatory agency, or if the material is not suitable for production, then the facility has approval from the regulatory agency.

rules.prover9_expression: (detected_issue(quality_control, material) -> (-(uses_technology(facility, purification_system) -> meets_standards(material, quality_spec)) -> causes_rejection(material, quality_control)))
rules.natural: If quality control detects an issue with the material, then if it is not the case that using the purification system technology implies the material meets quality specifications, this causes rejection of the material by quality control.

rules.prover9_expression: (detected_issue(quality_assurance, material) -> (-(uses_technology(facility, purification_system) -> meets_standards(material, quality_spec)) -> causes_rejection(material, quality_control)))
rules.natural: Provided that quality assurance detects an issue with the material, if it is not the case that using the purification system technology leads to the material meeting quality specifications, then this causes rejection of the material by quality control.
If test lab 1 reports conflicting results for the material, then test lab 2 reports conflicting results for the material.
If test lab 1 reports conflicting results for the material, then it is not the case that test lab 2 reports conflicting results for the material.
Either test lab 1 reports conflicting results for the material, or quality control detects an issue with the material, or quality assurance detects an issue with the material.
Either the material requires a retest, or it is processed with the advanced method, or it is processed with the standard method.
Either the material is cleared for production or it does not require a retest.
Whenever the inspector is assigned to the facility, the inspector conducts a review of the facility.
Either the inspector is assigned to the facility or the auditor is assigned to the facility.
Provided that the auditor is assigned to the facility, the material is not cleared for production.
If the material meets the quality specifications standards, then it is suitable for production.
In the event that the inspector conducts a review of the facility, the material is not cleared for production.
If the technology needs validation for the process, then the material is processed with the advanced method or it is processed with the standard method.
Either the technology needs validation for the process or it needs validation for the method.
Provided that the technology is certified by the industry, if validation is complete, then validation is pending.
If the facility uses the purification system technology, then the purification system improves the purity of the material.
Either the facility uses the purification system technology or it uses the synthesis reactor technology.
If the facility uses the synthesis reactor technology, then the material meets the quality specifications standards.
Provided that the material is processed with the advanced method, it passes testing by the quality lab.
If it is not the case that the technology requires certification from the safety board or from the quality board, then the facility is under investigation by the authorities.
In the event that it is not the case that needing validation for the method leads to the material being processed with the advanced or standard method, then validation of the technology is complete.
Provided that it is not the case that needing validation for the method results in the material being processed with the advanced or standard method, validation of the technology is not pending.

If it is not the case that using the purification system technology results in the material meeting quality specifications, then it is not the case that the material causes rejection by quality control.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(uses_technology(facility, purification_system) -> meets_standards(material, quality_spec)) -> causes_contamination(material, impurities)) -> requires_recall(product_batch))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that not using the purification system technology implying the material meets quality specifications leads to the material causing contamination due to impurities, then the product batch requires a recall.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(-suitable_for_production(material) -> has_approval(facility, regulatory_agency)) -> granted_extension(facility, deadline)) -> receives_fine(facility, regulatory_agency))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that not the material being unsuitable for production implying the facility has approval leads to the facility being granted an extension for the deadline, then the facility receives a fine from the regulatory agency.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(-suitable_for_production(material) -> has_approval(facility, regulatory_agency)) -> granted_extension(facility, deadline)) -> avoids_fine(facility, regulatory_agency))
rules.natural: Provided that it is not the case that not the material being unsuitable for production implying the facility has approval results in the facility being granted an extension for the deadline, the facility avoids a fine from the regulatory agency.
Whenever it is not the case that the material not being suitable for production implies the facility has approval, the facility is not granted an extension for the deadline.
If the technology is not approved for use in manufacturing, then it is rejected for use in manufacturing.
